website_summaries.verdict: Kids can take their karaoke party anywhere with this highly portable machine. It doesn't play CDs, but it does stream music using Bluetooth.
pros: Play background music using Bluetooth, USB, MicroSD, and auxiliary jack
Comes with one wired microphone with a 9.5-foot long cord
Also can work as a radio or speaker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it for my live streaming shows as I do mainly singing. It’s simple and easy to use. I had a problem with the mic - so I emailed the email that was on the box and asked about fixing it. They sent me a new one free of charge without me having to send in my old one, which saved me money on postage. They also replied to my email in less than two hours and shipped the microphone instantly. Thanks for handling everything so well!! Would highly recommend this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This product is all it said it was and it is very light weight and attractive. It has a secondary jack for a second microphone. It puts out plenty of sound with no feed back problems. The FM radio picks up signal clearly and my Grand kids love the echo feather on the mic. when in blue tooth mode. We will get lots of use from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this speaker! When I first saw the box I was worried at how loud it could be since the speaker is so small, but it performs exactly as we’d hoped! My 9 year old daughter wanted her own amp to sing with her brothers when they’re playing electric guitars and you can easily hear her voice over their amps. And it’s small size makes it ideal for toting around. Easy to use with music on our phones. We couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aimosus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this karaoke machine in late November last year for the holidays. I used this karaoke machine only a handful of time. It has been sitting in its original box. Well, today I decided to bring it out and the plug where you insert the mic completely pushed it after I inserted the mic cord. So then I popped on a smaller piece for the second mic insert and it also completely pushed back. Now both holes for mic cords are no longer working. I can’t use it anymore unless I open it and try to push it back out. Sad I missed my return mark.
customer_reviews.author: Pang M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Small second hand speaker style karaoke machine. I own a tiny 500 sq foot condo so it is perfect for at home fun and singing along to YouTube free karaoke without pestering my neighbors too much. Staving off boredome while we we self contain through Virapolcalpse.
customer_reviews.author: Tilda Swan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a gift for a 10 year old little girl. She played with it constantly and loves it. Pretty good quality for the price. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have been having fun with this. Can connect via Bluetooth and play music, it lasts a long time on a charge. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This gift was a big hit and the kids were actually arguing on who would use it next. It has great sound and several cool features like singing with the radio. The mic has a long cord so you can stand away from it to sing and dance. Portable and easy to use. I would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy two
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It works well for karaoke. However, an antenna is needed if you want to hear some FM radio stations and probably your favorite as with mine
customer_reviews.author: Sista P

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I bought for my 7 year old grandsons birthday since he loves to sing. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two times thinking that the first one was defective. But the same issue occurred within the 1st hour. The mic connections are poorly designed and don't work after the first hour. It's cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Cip

customer_reviews.title: Not well made. Mic connection broke on two separate machines.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great but got two of them and they both broke by the microphone connection
customer_reviews.author: Xtina21

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little outfit, not heavy, sounds good. The mic cord will not stay in, comes out. It really needs improvement in this area. It would be great if it was made with bluetooth...
customer_reviews.author: Nadia K

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker, nice and loud at karaoke, fun for all. Ordering one more
customer_reviews.text: Cool little speaker. Can’tlay it loud in the House. Loud and clear at 3/4 volume. Addendums, perfect speaker for 15 20 people. Cool for karaoke.
customer_reviews.author: Boer58

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this so my quieter students would be able to be heard during presentations. They love it! I even have students that use it to read on the smart board.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Gables

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I put this onto charge and the charger popped off leaving exposed wires in my outlet...Very disappointing and very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: LINSEY S.

customer_reviews.title: Mic stopped working after a few songs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my child as a holiday gift. It worked for a few songs then the karaoke mic that came with it wouldn’t work. Sad because that is the feature we wanted to work most. The speaker is not great either. I won’t be buying this again nor recommending.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old wanted a "sing machine" for his birthday. This sounds great and is easy to work. All I have to do is turn on the radio or TV and he can sing along without the machine having to be plugged into the wall. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: The receptacle for the mic plug came disconnected after a few uses and was unusable. Amazon was great and sent a replacement, which unfortunately had the same issue. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not just a toy....
customer_reviews.text: More than expected, has several features beyond the PA that make it a great addition to the musical instruments the grandkids play with;
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who doesn't talk to maybe use it to talk. The twin sister uses it. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and he played with it only s couple times and now it doesn’t work. The light turns on when it’s charging but the main screen doesn’t work and the sound doesn’t work. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my God daughter and she loved it. It's light weight and east to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Burch

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t turn back on
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product I had to return it . It worked for 1 use . Went to charge it and it never turned on again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but annoying noise
customer_reviews.text: So it was super easy to set up, however there was a very annoying noise in the background no matter what the volume was. Almost sounded like an alarm clock going of. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen OConnell

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product it works great the Bluetooth connects smoothly the sound is pretty loud this is a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter and she LOVED it! Clear sound and easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: margstep

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back the next day. Didn’t work after 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jule C

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I will be using it in my elementary classroom. Students will practice their speaking skills.
customer_reviews.author: Teach1

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound and portability of the machine however it will not charge the port is very loose and will not connect to charge. This was after only one months use so not satisfied with the durability of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: SoundBeast
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product, easy to use, sounds great and terrific pricing!
customer_reviews.author: Jill E. Stonecipher

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging, after 2nd time using
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a great product, but only charge twice, before it stopped charging. Window for returns is “closed,” so I guess we’re stick with a useless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Price

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it can be synced to blue tooth. It’s small in size yet produces a loud sound. The microphone worked well. Over all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: David s.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Small size, great quality! Just did a sound check on it before wrapping it up for my daughter for Christmas. She is in preschool so it is the perfect size (& price range) but doesn’t sacrifice sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should have opened it first and check it
customer_reviews.text: The component that plugged into the phone was broken but the computer plug it was fine my granddaughter already used it so I couldn't return the product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. Mic works on and off. Static background noise contact. Wast of money. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: Gets hot and stopped working but the sound is good
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Ford

customer_reviews.title: Fun, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this machine so my 8 year old could play weatherman. However, it has been used for much more! Great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SoundBeast Pegasus Karaoke Machine & Portable PA Speaker System For Kids & Adults - With Microphone & Bluetooth (Blue)
feature_bullets: All-In-One Bluetooth Sound System - Karaoke Machine, Music Speaker, PA System, FM Radio, Guitar Amp
Easy, Portable System For Kids & Adults - Lightweight with Powerful Sound
One Wired Microphone Included (9.5' Foot Cord)
Full 1-Year Warranty From SoundBeast - Extendable To 2 Years With Product Registration
